gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of all contact assignments for review.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of contact assignments with details such as ID, contact, and group.

gold.user: User creating a new contact assignment for a specific tenant.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new contact assignment and returns the created object with its ID.

gold.user: User updating an existing contact assignment to change the assigned contact.
gold.ideal: Updates the contact assignment and returns the updated object.

gold.user: Admin user deleting a contact assignment that is no longer needed.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the contact assignment and returns a confirmation message.

gold.user: User retrieving all contact groups to manage assignments.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of contact groups with their respective IDs and names.

gold.user: User creating a new contact group for better organization.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new contact group and returns the created object.

gold.user: User updating the name of an existing contact group.
gold.ideal: Partially updates the contact group and returns the updated object.

gold.user: Admin user fetching all contact roles for role assignment.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of contact roles with their IDs and descriptions.

gold.user: User adding a new contact to the system.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new contact and returns the created contact object.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving a list of all tenants for management purposes.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of tenants with their details including ID and name.

gold.user: User deleting a tenant that is no longer active.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the tenant and returns a confirmation message.
